title: What if someone fails in PCM in the CBSE 12th board exams? - Quora
tags: All India Senior School Certificate Examination
Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Nothing great stuff if you fails in your 12th class. That is common failing is just another step toward success according to a successful entrepreneur if you don't fail it means you are not trying so be calm and just increase your hard work nothing more than that. Rather than this there are several ways to move on some are:- Do your 12th again with more hard work and smart work.You can go for compartment exams.If you don't want to waste your year you can go with NIOS.You can go with a state board.Evenly after failing in 12th standard you can still go with your bachelor degree with some reputed college.For that if you are facing any problem than you can contact me for college and NIOS Marksheet. Contact me on 7248521707.
If someone fails in CBSE board examination, then he/she will have to appear in the compartment examination which is held in the month of July maybe.
